Subject: Re: Energon hunt
From: Jeremiah <rdahl@...>

Megatron looks up , very suprised to find a robot, and not a generator. He
was aiming his rifle at my head, thought Megatron, but with his energy
levels so low, it didnt matter if he died at the hands of an enemy robot,
or enegron exaustion. This was his last chance, to survive. He forced
himself to his feet, every gear in him straining to support his weight,
when his energon was so low. Ignoring his screaming computer warning
systems, he addressed the robot. "I, huhhhhhhh, am Megatron, hhhh *cough
cough*". He finished weakly, he then with all of his might raised his
fusion cannon, to let the uknown robot get a good look at it, but he did
not aim it at Autofir, and even if he could aim it, he probably couldnt
even fire a low powered blast anyways.
